root.title: nova win govern okai huski hyo deal
root.body: nova canadian compani 56 pct huski oil ltd sai receiv govern approv transact union faith canada hold ltd bui 43 pct stake huski nova sai minist region industri expans michel cote rule union faith purchas huski stake result huski cede control non canadian compani sai rule kei condit complet deal union faith equal hutchison whampoa ltd hong kong electr hold ltd agreement union faith huski will becom privat compani union faith nova hold 43 pct stock nine pct huski rel li ka shing chairman hutchison five pct canadian imperi bank commeric
